data.title: Cape Air's Northeast Airports
data.meta_description: Information and details on Cape Air's stations at airports throughout New England and New York
data.text:
Take a moment to familiarize yourself with individual airport policies and check-in procedures. The links below provide directions and everything you need to ensure a smooth trip. All airports require that you present a current, government-issued photo identification such as a driver's license upon check-in.

Massachusetts

Boston

Click here for information and directions to Logan International Airport. Cape Air is located in Terminal C.

Hyannis

Click here for information and directions to Barnstable Municipal Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Provincetown

Click here for information and directions to Provincetown Municipal Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Nantucket

Click here for information and directions to Nantucket Memorial Airport. Cape Air and Nantucket Airlines are located in the main terminal.

Martha's Vineyard

Click here for information and directions to Martha's Vineyard Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

New Bedford

Click here for information and directions to New Bedford Regional Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Vermont

Rutland

Click here for information and directions to Rutland Southern Vermont Regional Airport. Cape Air operates from the main terminal.

New Hampshire

Lebanon

Click here for information and directions to Lebanon Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Maine

Augusta

Click here for information and directions to Augusta State Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

Rockland

Click here for information and directions to Knox County Regional Airport in Rockland.

Bar Harbor

Click here for information and directions to The Hancock County-Bar Harbor Airport. Cape Air is located in the main terminal.

New York

JFK

Click here for information and directions to John F. Kennedy International Airport Cape Air is located in Terminal 5.

White Plains

Click here for information and directions to Westchester County Airport. Cape Air is located in Hangar A.

Manhattan

Effective June 12, 2024, our ground transportation service picks up and drops off passengers on the west side of Hudson Boulevard East, near the corner of 34th Street, across the street from the MTA 34th St-Hudson Yards subway station, and ajacent to Bella Abzug Park.
